description: The University is known for providing quality education to all the students through both full time and distance studying options in different colleges affiliated to the university. Stream-wise name of the major courses with eligibility is briefed below:

Course 4: MBA - Masters in Business Administration

basic_info.name: Yogi Vemana University Admissions
description: The Candidates seeking admission in YVU must register themselves for their desired courses. The mode of registration for UG and PG is online and Ph.D. aspirants can apply through offline mode. The application forms for UG and PG are available on the website. Ph.D. aspirants can avail of the form from the concerned departments. The selection procedure of the candidates is based on their marks obtained in YVUCET, conducted by the university itself.

Section.name: About YVU
Section.description:
Yogi Vemana University namely YVU came into existence on March 9, 2006. The university is located 15 km away from Kadapa city. The university is committed to nourish and uphold healthy educational standards which provide to the social, intellectual and ethical development of the students. It provides Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Ph.D. programs such as B.Com, B.Sc., MA, BFA and more. Yogi Vemana University admissions in Postgraduate programs are done on the basis of merit in YVUCET and for Ph.D. the eligibility criteria vary from specialization to specialization.
The University is known for providing quality education to all the students through both full time and distance studying options in different colleges affiliated to the university. Stream-wise name of the major courses with eligibility is briefed below:
Course 1: BA - Bachelors of Arts
Duration – 3 Years Specialization – Communication & Journalism, Economics, English, History & Archaeology, Political Science & Public Administration, and Telugu. Eligibility – Intermediate (10+2) in any discipline from a recognized board.
Course 2: B.Sc. - Bachelors of Science
Duration – 3 Years Specialization – Applied Mathematics, Biochemistry, Botany, Biotechnology, Chemistry, Environmental Sciences, Genetics & Genomics, Geology & Geoinformatics, Material science & Nanotechnology, Microbiology, Physics, Physical Education & Sports Sciences, Psychology, and Zoology Eligibility – Intermediate (10+2) in Science discipline from a recognized board.
Course 3: M.Sc. - Masters of Science
Duration – 2 Years Specialization – Applied Mathematics, Biochemistry, Botany, Biotechnology, Chemistry, Genetics & Genomics, Geology & Geoinformatics, Microbiology, Physics, Physical Education & Sports Sciences, Psychology, and Zoology Eligibility – B.Sc. graduates in concerned subjects from a recognized university
Course 4: MBA - Masters in Business Administration
Duration – 2 Years Specialization – Human Resource Management Eligibility – Graduate in any discipline with a minimum of 50% in total aggregate
Note: The University offers many postgraduate diploma courses along with the degree and certification programs. Along with this, the university also provides LAW courses under the colleges affiliated to the university which are given below:
The Candidates seeking admission in YVU must register themselves for their desired courses. The mode of registration for UG and PG is online and Ph.D. aspirants can apply through offline mode. The application forms for UG and PG are available on the website. Ph.D. aspirants can avail of the form from the concerned departments. The selection procedure of the candidates is based on their marks obtained in YVUCET, conducted by the university itself.
